title: CTK: Conversation Toolkit
description: A robust toolkit for managing tree-based AI conversations from multiple providers. CTK provides a unified format for importing, storing, searching, and exporting conversations while preserving provider-specific details and conversation branching structure.
notes: Part of the longecho personal archive ecosystem. Supports importing from OpenAI/ChatGPT, Anthropic/Claude, Google Gemini, GitHub Copilot, and other AI assistants. Exports to JSONL (fine-tuning), Markdown, HTML, Hugo, and ECHO archive format.
